Entries.default: "Governor Alvari doesn't appreciate any disruption of business."
"Stairs are to the northwest. Please step lightly."
The guard fixes you with an empty expression.
"Unless you have business here, turn around right now."
"Apologies, but the director is not in. You will have to return another time."
"The governor is not here at the moment. You must take your business elsewhere."
The guard wordlessly motions for you to move along.
"Get him! The governor must have time to reach safety!"
Entries.female: "Get her! The governor must have time to reach safety!"

Entries.default: "Get him! We must give the director time to reach safety!"
Entries.female: "Get her! We must give the Director time to reach safety!"
